Personal Injury Law Firm Zephyrhills, FL

The Romano Law Firm is a comprehensive personal injury law firm whose attorneys are dedicated to getting fair compensation for victims of personal injury in Zephyrhills. If someone is responsible for injuring you or someone you know, you have the right to financial compensation, and our expert lawyers will make the responsible party take responsibility. We are experienced handling a wide range of Tampa personal injury cases, and we are here to help make your voice heard.


Without proper representation, the big insurance companies can be extremely intimidating. Knowing a Zephyrhills personal injury attorney from the Romano Law Firm is on your side will give you peace of mind because our attorneys have successfully taken on these companies in the past. Our greatest strength is our passion for helping our clients get back on their feet by getting them the financial relief theydeserve.

Choosing a Personal Injury Law Firm in Zephyrhills

When you make the decision to look for a personal injury law firm in Zephyrhills to represent you, you’ll have to sift through a lot of information. Hiring a law firm you can depend on to represent you is extremely important, yet with so many choices out there, it can seem like a daunting task. A personal injury attorney from the Romano Law Firm is the perfect choice because we have the passion and individualism of a small firm with the resources of a large firm. We understand that your case is unique, which is why we won’t just plug you into some formula. Our Zephyrhills personal injury lawyers always take time to get to know you and your case.


We also work with a team of legal and medical experts who will guide you on your way to maximum recovery and document your injuries to aid our attorneys in gaining all available compensation for you.


If you or someone you know has been injured by fault of someone else, including in a Tampa auto accident, it’s time to end the search for a Zephyhills personal injury law firm and call the Romano Law Firm today.

Call today at (813) 293-9000.
